title: User
description: The foundational schema for user accounts, used for authentication and access control. This is the single source of truth for user data.

personId.description: Foreign key to the corresponding person's biographical profile.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was last updated.

isActive.description: Indicates if the user account is active.

roles.description: An array of roles assigned to the user (e.g., 'admin', 'editor').
